title: Understanding API Rate Limits
content:
# API Rate Limits Explained

Our API implements rate limiting to ensure fair usage and platform stability. This guide explains how our rate limits work and how to optimize your integration.

## Rate Limit Tiers
- Standard: 1,000 requests/minute
- Business: 5,000 requests/minute
- Enterprise: Custom limits

## Best Practices
1. Implement exponential backoff
2. Use bulk endpoints where possible
3. Cache responses appropriately

## Monitoring
Use the X-RateLimit-* headers to track your usage...

title: Kubernetes Integration Guide
content:
# Kubernetes Integration

This guide covers setting up and optimizing our service with Kubernetes.

## Autoscaling Configuration
```yaml
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
...
```

## Best Practices
1. Resource requests and limits
2. Monitoring setup
3. High availability configuration
